name: Wateroo
description:
Uh oh, gross little mud creatures have invaded your pool area! You don't want them to get into your pool, or else it'll get dirty, which means no one will want to swim in it! 

Shoot 'em and then knock 'em down! Those will teach them not to mess your pool

Once again, keep your pool clean. There's no way to make it clean again

Made for Mini Jam 104

(TIP: When you get knocked down, mash the jump button)
